<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

This project is a Next.js app for uploading car data logs (CSV/JSON) and visualizing them with charts. Prioritize code for file upload, data parsing, and chart rendering using a modern charting library (e.g., Chart.js).
